ivardefs.name: alias_
ivardefs.desc: Alternative representation of the title for this Contract definition, derivative, or instance in any legal state., e.g., a domain specific contract number related to legislation.

ivardefs.name: applies
ivardefs.desc: Relevant time or time-period when this Contract is applicable.

ivardefs.name: author
ivardefs.desc: The individual or organization that authored the Contract definition, derivative, or instance in any legal state.

ivardefs.name: authority_
ivardefs.desc: A formally or informally recognized grouping of people, principals, organizations, or jurisdictions formed for the purpose of achieving some form of collective action such as the promulgation, administration and enforcement of contracts and policies.

ivardefs.name: contentDefinition
ivardefs.desc: Precusory content developed with a focus and intent of supporting the formation a Contract instance, which may be associated with and transformable into a Contract.

ivardefs.name: contentDerivative
ivardefs.desc: The minimal content derived from the basal information source at a specific stage in its lifecycle.

ivardefs.name: domain_
ivardefs.desc: Recognized governance framework or system operating with a circumscribed scope in accordance with specified principles, policies, processes or procedures for managing rights, actions, or behaviors of parties or principals relative to resources.

ivardefs.name: expirationType
ivardefs.desc: Event resulting in discontinuation or termination of this Contract instance by one or more parties to the contract.

ivardefs.name: friendly_
ivardefs.desc: The "patient friendly language" versionof the Contract in whole or in parts. "Patient friendly language" means the representation of the Contract and Contract Provisions in a manner that is readily accessible and understandable by a layperson in accordanc

ivardefs.name: identifier_
ivardefs.desc: Unique identifier for this Contract or a derivative that references a Source Contract.

ivardefs.name: instantiatesCanonical
ivardefs.desc: The URL pointing to a FHIR-defined Contract Definition that is adhered to in whole or part by this Contract.

ivardefs.name: instantiatesUri
ivardefs.desc: The URL pointing to an externally maintained definition that is adhered to in whole or in part by this Contract.

ivardefs.name: issued
ivardefs.desc: When this  Contract was issued.

ivardefs.name: legalState
ivardefs.desc: Legal states of the formation of a legal instrument, which is a formally executed written document that can be formally attributed to its author, records and formally expresses a legally enforceable act, process, or contractual duty, obligation, or right,

ivardefs.name: legal_
ivardefs.desc: List of Legal expressions or representations of this Contract.

ivardefs.name: name
ivardefs.desc: A natural language name identifying this Contract definition, derivative, or instance in any legal state. Provides additional information about its content. This name should be usable as an identifier for the module by machine processing applications such

ivardefs.name: relevantHistory_
ivardefs.desc: Links to Provenance records for past versions of this Contract definition, derivative, or instance, which identify key state transitions or updates that are likely to be relevant to a user looking at the current version of the Contract.  The Provence.enti

ivardefs.name: rule_
ivardefs.desc: List of Computable Policy Rule Language Representations of this Contract.

ivardefs.name: scope
ivardefs.desc: A selector of legal concerns for this Contract definition, derivative, or instance in any legal state.

ivardefs.name: signer_
ivardefs.desc: Parties with legal standing in the Contract, including the principal parties, the grantor(s) and grantee(s), which are any person or organization bound by the contract, and any ancillary parties, which facilitate the execution of the contract such as a no

ivardefs.name: site_
ivardefs.desc: Sites in which the contract is complied with,  exercised, or in force.

ivardefs.name: status
ivardefs.desc: The status of the resource instance.

ivardefs.name: subject_
ivardefs.desc: The target entity impacted by or of interest to parties to the agreement.

ivardefs.name: subtitle
ivardefs.desc: An explanatory or alternate user-friendly title for this Contract definition, derivative, or instance in any legal state.t giving additional information about its content.

ivardefs.name: subType_
ivardefs.desc: Sub-category for the Contract that distinguishes the kinds of systems that would be interested in the Contract within the context of the Contract's scope.

ivardefs.name: supportingInfo_
ivardefs.desc: Information that may be needed by/relevant to the performer in their execution of this term action.

ivardefs.name: term_
ivardefs.desc: One or more Contract Provisions, which may be related and conveyed as a group, and may contain nested groups.

ivardefs.name: title
ivardefs.desc: A short, descriptive, user-friendly title for this Contract definition, derivative, or instance in any legal state.t giving additional information about its content.

ivardefs.name: type
ivardefs.desc: A high-level category for the legal instrument, whether constructed as a Contract definition, derivative, or instance in any legal state.  Provides additional information about its content within the context of the Contract's scope to distinguish the kind

ivardefs.name: url
ivardefs.desc: Canonical identifier for this contract, represented as a URI (globally unique).

ivardefs.name: version
ivardefs.desc: An edition identifier used for business purposes to label business significant variants.

properties.desc: Legally enforceable, formally recorded unilateral or bilateral directive i.e., a policy or agreement.
